name: Acrizia
aura: Increase Ally C. RATE in  by 19

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 45% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. 

The damage of this skill increases by 10% every time this skill is used. Stacks up to 100%.

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. The value of the [Shield] buff is equal to 5% of this Champion’s MAX HP for each critical hit.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has an 80% chance of stealing 100% of the target’s Turn Meter before attacking. This effect cannot be resisted if the target has higher MAX HP than this Champion.

skills.desc:
Decreases the damage taken from AoE attacks by 50%. 

If a target’s MAX HP is more than double this Champion's MAX HP, this Champion’s attacks will deal damage based on the target's MAX HP, instead of this Champion's ATK.
